page.title: 02THE COMMUNITY CENTRE-OULTON
page.content: The community centre near Oulton Street stands on the site of a former church and hall which were pulled down. The new building,which includes a church,had to face the same direction as the old one. The centre is used every day as follows: Monday:Cubs,Scouts,Guides,Brownies. Tuesday:Playgroup,O.A.P.Club,Youth Cl. Wednesday:Brownies,Bingo,Morris-Men. Thursday:Keep-Fit. Friday:Disco. Saturday:Weddings,Wedding Receptions, Parties. In early summer the committee hold an annual fete and in November a huge bonfire party is organised.The four acres of land on which the centre stands has a car park,play area and a football pitch.
